document_title: Parasitic infections: Causes, signs, diagnosis and treatment
subsection_content:
If parasitic diseases are not detected and treated promptly, they will cause many dangerous complications such as: worms straying to important organs, intestinal obstruction, bile duct obstruction, meningitis, cardiovascular disorders. , pneumonia, enteritis, anemia, malnutrition.
In particular, for immunocompromised patients, the consequences can be severe and can lead to death if not detected and treated promptly.
